ivardefs.name: approvalDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was approved by the publisher. Approval happens once when the content is officially approved for usage.

ivardefs.name: author_
ivardefs.desc: An individiual or organization primarily involved in the creation and maintenance of the content.

ivardefs.name: comment_
ivardefs.desc: A human-readable string to clarify or explain concepts about the resource.

ivardefs.name: contact_
ivardefs.desc: Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher.

ivardefs.name: copyright
ivardefs.desc: A copyright statement relating to the research definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the research definition.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: The date  (and optionally time) when the research definition was published. The date must change when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the research de

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A free text natural language description of the research definition from a consumer's perspective.

ivardefs.name: editor_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for internal coherence of the content.

ivardefs.name: effectivePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The period during which the research definition content was or is planned to be in active use.

ivardefs.name: endorser_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization responsible for officially endorsing the content for use in some setting.

ivardefs.name: experimental
ivardefs.desc: A Boolean value to indicate that this research definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing) and is not intended to be used for genuine usage.

ivardefs.name: exposure
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a ResearchElementDefinition resource that defines the exposure for the research.

ivardefs.name: exposureAlternative
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a ResearchElementDefinition resource that defines the exposureAlternative for the research.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this research definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

ivardefs.name: jurisdiction_
ivardefs.desc: A legal or geographic region in which the research definition is intended to be used.

ivardefs.name: lastReviewDate
ivardefs.desc: The date on which the resource content was last reviewed. Review happens periodically after approval but does not change the original approval date.

ivardefs.name: library_
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a Library resource containing the formal logic used by the ResearchDefinition.

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: A natural language name identifying the research definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation.

ivardefs.name: outcome
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a ResearchElementDefinition resomece that defines the outcome for the research.

ivardefs.name: population
ivardefs.desc: A reference to a ResearchElementDefinition resource that defines the population for the research.

ivardefs.name: publisher
ivardefs.desc: The name of the organization or individual that published the research definition.

ivardefs.name: purpose
ivardefs.desc: Explanation of why this research definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has.

ivardefs.name: relatedArtifact_
ivardefs.desc: Related artifacts such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references.

ivardefs.name: reviewer_
ivardefs.desc: An individual or organization primarily responsible for review of some aspect of the content.

ivardefs.name: shortTitle
ivardefs.desc: The short title provides an alternate title for use in informal descriptive contexts where the full, formal title is not necessary.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of this research definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content.

ivardefs.name: subtitle
ivardefs.desc: An explanatory or alternate title for the ResearchDefinition giving additional information about its content.

ivardefs.name: title
ivardefs.desc: A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the research definition.

ivardefs.name: topic_
ivardefs.desc: Descriptive topics related to the content of the ResearchDefinition. Topics provide a high-level categorization grouping types of ResearchDefinitions that can be useful for filtering and searching.

ivardefs.name: url
ivardefs.desc: An absolute URI that is used to identify this research definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance; also called its canonical identifier. This SHOULD be globally unique and SHOULD be a literal address at which at whic

ivardefs.name: usage
ivardefs.desc: A detailed description, from a clinical perspective, of how the ResearchDefinition is used.

ivardefs.name: useContext_
ivardefs.desc: The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These contexts may be general categories (gender, age, ...) or may be references to specific programs (insurance plans, studies, ...) and may be used to assist w

ivardefs.name: version
ivardefs.desc: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the research definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the research definition author and is not expected to be globally un

properties.desc: The ResearchDefinition resource describes the conditional state (population and any exposures being compared within the population) and outcome (if specified) that the knowledge (evidence, assertion, recommendation) is about.
